name: Fairy Mahjong Valentine's Day.
description:
Fairy Mahjong Valentine's Day is a highly innovative and addictive 3D skill-based puzzle game. Combining outstanding levels, colorful graphics and great audio effects. It is one of the most original and fun games in the App Store.
Fairy Mahjong Valentine's Day combines mahjong and 3-matching game-plays with accurate touch controls in a 3D environment.

- 45 levels
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Easy, normal and hard game modes
- Great soundtracks and audio effects
- Fun and addictive game-play elements
